title: Rosie's walk
creator_credit: Gene Deitch, Morton Schindel and Weston Woods Studios
brief_description: To the tune of “Turkey In The Straw”, the little red hen Rosie struts across the barnyard keeping her country cool, while unknowingly leading a stalking fox into one disaster after another. The spirited country music accompanying Pat Hutchins’ colourful illustrations make this suspenseful story a delightful fast-moving film.
